conclusion: Violation of Art. 6-1 as regards the fairness of the proceedings;Violation of Art. 6-1 as regards the length of the proceedings;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;Damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF ZIELINSKI AND PRADAL & GONZALEZ AND OTHERS v. FRANCE - [Georgian Translation]
